sentences: Kinga kõpsu ja hänna hööri oli pulmapeol laialt.
context: In Estonian, 'riista' appears to be a form of the word 'höör', which means a revolving, twisting movement. It can refer to athletic movements in sports like gymnastics where performers rotate around an apparatus axis or handle points (rings, horizontal bars). The term is also used more generally for circular or turning motions.
